pages.title: Alexandrite Paxel
pages.text: The Alexandrite Paxel is a unique item, it combines the mining power of an Axe, Shovel and a Pickaxe all into one Tool, Once you have an Alexandrite Paxel you can use it to mine Alexandrite Ores which are located in the same region as Diamonds.$(br2)Alexandrite Ore can only be Mined with Alexandrite tools, You can then use Alexandrite to craft its respective Tools, Weapons and Armour. The Ultimate End Game Tier.

pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: This is the only way to craft the Alexandrite Paxel. To Craft other Alexandrite gear follow the same crafting Recipes of Diamond Weapons/Tools/Armour but use Alexandrite instead.
